select pin.id, pin.pharmacy_id, pin.drug_id, pin.reserve, pin.shelf_status, pi2.name as pharmacyName, pi2.code as pharmacyCode, di.name as drugName, di.brand, di.category, di.images from pharmacy_inventory pin left join pharmacy_info pi2 on (pi2.id = pin.pharmacy_id) left join drug_info di on (di.id = pin.drug_id) where 1 = 1
AND pi2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pharmacyInventory.pharmacyName},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pharmacyInventory.drugName},'%')
AND di.brand LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pharmacyInventory.brand},'%')
